Great competitive game, hard to master and learn recoil control and stuff, but totally worth putting the effort into it.

The only problem is there is A LOT of cheaters, and Valve's Anti-Cheat is not good enough, so most of them go unpunished. The game is worth it, but you might wanna play on suscription-based servers like ESEA or Face-It for a more competitive enviroment.
